actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Commodity Futures Trading Commission Act of 1974 to make certain technical changes.
short_title: Commodity Futures Trading Commission Act Amendments

summary.text: Commodity Futures Trading Commission Act Amendments - Repeals the requirement that the Presidential appointment of an Executive Director of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission be made with the advice and consent of the Senate under the Commodity Futures Trading Commission Act. Repeals the effective date for the registration of commodity trading advisors and commodity pool operators. Requires approval by the Commission of board of trade rules relating to specified commodity exchanges. Requires floor brokers (previously brokers) to maintain daily trading records for each customer.

titles.title: Commodity Futures Trading Commission Act Amendments
A bill to amend the Commodity Futures Trading Commission Act of 1974 to make certain technical changes.
